TopicTitle: Mods not working, even with CKAN (Linux+Proton)

Articles.Content:
Hi all, I am not able to get KSP2 mods working at all, even using CKAN. I'm playing on Linux via Proton so I assume that's related.

I see that there is a path in doorstop_config.ini. I did try a full path there in case something was weird with relative paths, but to no avail. I never see the Mods tab on the main menu, regardless of what I do in CKAN and regardless of the folder structure appearing correct.

Is anyone able to use KSP2 mods while playing via Proton, and if so, was there anything special you had to do to make it work? I'm really scratching my head on this one because everything else seems perfect.

Playing on KSP2 0.2.

Edited December 23, 2023 by Cmdr Oishii
Tagged

BepinEx needs a little tweaking in winecfg before it will work:

https://docs.bepinex.dev/articles/advanced/proton_wine.html

@severedsolo Thank you soooo much! That was indeed it.

If anyone else runs into the issue, just follow the instructions in the above link. Basically you just need to add an entry for winhttp in the winecfg for the KSP2 prefix.
